body: Hi Mostapha, after I update my file, the definition not work, one of the problem was because the bldgProgram component can't access the sub program..so How Can I access this sub program with the new component?[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Y-6c8O6EPx9wQ1GodS-ED7YaQccSMVjsa8kBZhjyrdhhVs42ROB89cSiRszXx7Sp1jXAthwpw4pC8iD5oD5d-RSY0dA2pByk/bldg2.PNG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Y-6c8O6EPx-*fWUMWX0fnSzYsyUL7ZlUWi02m*0jdLAJM-Z7DR*21K3h7bKreglcD6xWFIXqGN1yqxrEnKqTGMtWvyuAKNm1/bldg1.PNG)Thanks, Agus
